mapper.select: SELECT UNQ_ID as unqId, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as postDate, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as writeDate FROM cells WHERE USER_ID = #{unqId}

SELECT cells.UNQ_ID as unqId, TO_CHAR(cells.POST_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as postDate, cells.TITLE, cells.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(cells.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as writeDate, categorys.NAME as categoryName FROM cells JOIN category_cells ON cells.UNQ_ID = category_cells.CELL_ID JOIN categorys ON category_cells.CATEGORY_ID = categorys.UNQ_ID WHERE cells.UNQ_ID = #{cellId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cells ( UNQ_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, POST_DATE, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{cell.unqId}, #{userId}, #{cell.title}, #{cell.postDate}, #{cell.content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cells SET POST_DATE = #{postDate}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE UNQ_ID = #{unqId}
